votebox.middle.ballot

Class ACardStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • votebox.middle.ballot.ACardStrategy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KofN, RadioButton, StraightTicket

    public abstract class ACardStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    The Card class is the model's representation for a piece of the ballot. Because, in the Card delegates to an implementation of this interface for its behavior regarding what to do when a SelectableCardElement decides that it would like to be selected. A SelectableCardElement delegates to a Card on what to do when its Toggle method is called, and the Card then delegates to these methods. Class converted from .NET code

      When a SelectableCardElement has decided that it would like to be selected, it delegates to this method.
